00030    using namespace Util;
00031    
00032    const int BennettsMethod::TagDerivative[2]    = {1, 2};
00033    const int BennettsMethod::TagFermi[2]    = {8, 9};
00034 
00035    /* 
00036    * Constructor.
00037    */
00038    BennettsMethod::BennettsMethod(System& system)
00039     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00040       shift_(0.0),
00041       lowerShift_(0.0),
00042       shifts_(),
00043       communicatorPtr_(0),
00044       myId_(-1),
00045       nProcs_(0),
00046       lowerId_(-1),
00047       upperId_(-1),
00048       nParameter_(0),
00049       myParam_(),
00050       lowerParam_(),
00051       upperParam_(),
00052       nSamplePerBlock_(1),
00053       myAccumulator_(),
00054       upperAccumulator_(),
00055       myArg_(0.0),
00056       lowerArg_(0.0),
00057       myFermi_(0.0),
00058       lowerFermi_(0.0),
00059       upperFermi_(0.0),
00060       outputFile_(),
00061       isInitialized_(false)
00062    {  
00063       communicatorPtr_ = &(system.simulation().communicator());
00064       myId_   = communicatorPtr_->Get_rank();
00065       nProcs_ = communicatorPtr_->Get_size();   
00066       if (myId_ != 0) { 
00067          lowerId_ = myId_ - 1;
00068       } else {
00069          lowerId_ = myId_;
00070       }
00071       if (myId_ != nProcs_-1) {
00072          upperId_ = myId_ + 1;
00073       } else {
00074          upperId_ = myId_;
00075       }
00076       nParameter_ = system.perturbation().getNParameters(); 
00077       myParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00078       lowerParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00079       upperParam_.allocate(nParameter_);
00080    }
00081 
00082    /*
00083    * Read parameters and initialize.
00084    */
00085    void BennettsMethod::readParam(std::istream& in)
00086    {
00087       readInterval(in);
00088       readOutputFileName(in);
00089 
00090       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00091  
00092       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00093       if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00094          shifts_.allocate(nProcs_);
00095          shifts_[nProcs_-1]=0.0;
00096          readDArray<double>(in, "shifts", shifts_, nProcs_-1);
00097          shift_ = shifts_[myId_];
00098       } else {
00099          read<double>(in, "shift", shift_);
00100       }
00101       #else
00102       read<double>(in, "shift", shift_);
00103       #endif
00104       
00105       myAccumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00106       upperAccumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00107 
00108       //If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00109       if (myAccumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00110          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00111       }
00112 
00113       isInitialized_ = true;
00114    }
00115     
00116    void BennettsMethod::setup()
00117    { 
00118       if (!isInitialized_) UTIL_THROW("Object is not initialized");
00119 
00120       communicatorPtr_->Bcast((void*)&shifts_[0], nProcs_, MPI::DOUBLE, 0);
00121       if ( myId_ != 0 ) {
00122          lowerShift_ = shifts_[lowerId_];
00123       } else {}
00124 
00125       myAccumulator_.clear();
00126       upperAccumulator_.clear();
00127    }
00128 
00129    void BennettsMethod::sample(long iStep) 
00130    {
00131       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00132 
00133       int myPort, upperPort;
00134       MPI::Request requestFermi[2];
00135       MPI::Status  status;
00136 
00137       // Exchange perturbation parameters and differences
00138       if (myId_ != 0 && myId_ != nProcs_ - 1) {
00139 
00140          myPort = myId_%2;
00141          upperPort = upperId_%2;
00142 
00143          for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00144             myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00145             lowerParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i,lowerId_);
00146             upperParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i,upperId_);
00147          }
00148 
00149          myArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(upperParam_);
00150          lowerArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(lowerParam_);
00151 
00152          myArg_ -= shift_;
00153          lowerArg_ += lowerShift_;
00154             
00155          myFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(myArg_));
00156          lowerFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(lowerArg_));
00157             
00158          requestFermi[0] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(&upperFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, upperId_,
00159                                              TagFermi[upperPort]);
00160             
00161          requestFermi[1] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(&lowerFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, lowerId_,
00162                                              TagFermi[myPort]);
00163             
00164          // Synchronizing
00165          requestFermi[0].Wait();
00166          requestFermi[1].Wait();
00167 
00168          upperAccumulator_.sample(upperFermi_);
00169          myAccumulator_.sample(myFermi_);
00170 
00171          outputFile_ << Dbl(myFermi_) << "    " << Dbl(upperFermi_) << "    ";
00172          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00173  
00174          } else if (myId_ == 0) {
00175             
00176             myPort = myId_%2;
00177             upperPort = upperId_%2;
00178 
00179             for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00180                myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00181                upperParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i, upperId_);
00182             }
00183 
00184             myArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(upperParam_);
00185             myArg_ -= shift_;
00186             
00187             myFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(myArg_));
00188             
00189             requestFermi[0] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(&upperFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, upperId_,
00190                                               TagFermi[upperPort]);
00191              
00192             // Synchronizing
00193             requestFermi[0].Wait();
00194             
00195             upperAccumulator_.sample(upperFermi_);
00196             myAccumulator_.sample(myFermi_);
00197             
00198             outputFile_ << Dbl(myFermi_) << "    " << Dbl(upperFermi_) << "    ";
00199             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00200 
00201          } else if (myId_ == nProcs_ - 1) {
00202             
00203             myPort = myId_%2;
00204 
00205             for (int i = 0; i < nParameter_; ++i) {
00206                myParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00207                lowerParam_[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i, lowerId_);
00208             }
00209 
00210             lowerArg_ = system().perturbation().difference(lowerParam_);
00211             lowerArg_ += lowerShift_;
00212             
00213             lowerFermi_ = 1/(1 + exp(lowerArg_));
00214             
00215             requestFermi[1] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(&lowerFermi_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, lowerId_,
00216                                                TagFermi[myPort]);
00217          
00218             // Synchronizing
00219             requestFermi[1].Wait();
00220         }
00221    }
00222 
00223    void BennettsMethod::analyze()
00224    {
00225       double EnergyDiff, ratio, improvedShift;
00226       if (myId_ != nProcs_ - 1) {
00227        
00228          ratio = upperAccumulator_.average()/myAccumulator_.average();
00229       
00230          EnergyDiff = log(ratio)+shift_;
00231       
00232          improvedShift = EnergyDiff;
00233             
00234          shifts_[myId_] = improvedShift; 
00235          shift_ = improvedShift; 
00236       } else {}
00237    
00238    }
00239    
00240    
00241    // Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00242    void BennettsMethod::output() 
00243    {
00244       if (myAccumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00245          outputFile_.close();
00246       }
00247 
00248       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00249       if (myId_ != nProcs_ - 1) {
00250          myAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00251          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00252          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00253          upperAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00254          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00255          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00256       }
00257       outputFile_.close();
00258 
00259       analyze(); 
00260 
00261       communicatorPtr_->Gather((const void *) &shift_, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, (void *) &shifts_[0], 1, MPI::DOUBLE, 0);
00262       int i;
00263       if (myId_ == 0) {
00264          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName("_all.dat"), outputFile_);
00265          for (i = 0; i < nProcs_-1; ++i) {
00266             outputFile_ << Dbl(shifts_[i]);
00267             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00268          }
00269          outputFile_.close();
00270       
00271       } else {}
00272    }
00273 }
